thread.section_title: WowVendor.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of WowVendor.com | wowvendor.com
thread.title: Eric D

author: Eric D
title: Eric D
text: Like other posters i was a bit skeptical. what i found out though is a that its a first rate professional service that delivers what you pay for. I signed up for a NH normal Master loot on 03/08 they wanted to do it the next day, i could not because of work, so pushed to 03/11. they were on time for the invite and summon. they were fantastic no wipes i died 4 times. i got a full tier set and 8 pieces. none of those were bonus rolls. i would recommend and will do it again on a different toon.
